titulo: Coches RC, Coche de Control Remoto Rosa para Niñas, 2.4 GHZ Coche de Acrobacias RC de Doble Cara Giratorio 360° Control Remoto Crawler con Faros Juguetes de Coches para Niñas de 6 7 8 9 10 11
descripcion: 【Módulos de batería recargable mejorados】El coche de trucos RC QUNREDA adopta 2 módulos de batería recargable, uno en el cuerpo del coche RC, el otro en el paquete para uso alternativo. ¡Sí! Los módulos de batería son desmontables, lo que es más seguro y portátil para que los niños recarguen y jueguen Los módulos de batería cubiertos con una carcasa premium de ABS, integrados con el cuerpo, se pueden extraer fácilmente del cuerpo del coche de carreras. Cada módulo de batería soporta 25 minutos de juego y dos juntos son 50 minutos!

【Control fácil para nueve juegos de acrobacias】Solo hay dos botones en el controlador, pero puedes obtener 9 diferentes juegos de acrobacias como muestra el manual del usuario. Correr hacia adelante y hacia atrás son operaciones básicas. También girar en sentido horario y en sentido antihorario son fáciles de manipular. Además, el coche puede girar 360° de doble cara en movimiento, ¡bastante genial para que lo pruebes! Por supuesto, el coche de regalo para niños de 6 a 12 años permite hacer volteretas laterales al avanzar o retroceder.

【Anti-Interferencia de Largo Alcance】El coche de control remoto QUNREDA admite control de larga distancia y anti-interferencia de 2.4GHz. Los niños pueden jugar al auto a control remoto juntos para cosechar su felicidad única, incluso pueden tener una carrera de autos de acrobacias Múltiples juegos de autos de juguete de carreras de alta velocidad a control remoto seguirán su propio camino sin interferir entre sí El coche RC todoterreno mejorado se puede controlar dentro de 50 metros, es decir, el coche RC que se voltea 360° siempre estará a la vista mientras juegas.

【Faros LED rojos y neumáticos duraderos】Dos luces LED rojas incorporadas en la cabeza del coche RC remoto, parecen ojos de coche para indicar la dirección de la cabeza a los jugadores. Además, la carrocería principal del auto de acrobacias todoterreno está hecha de ABS de alta calidad con colores dobles. En cuanto a los 4 neumáticos, están hechos de plástico ABS relativamente suave pero duradero, que dota al auto de juguete de regalo de absorción de impactos, agarre fuerte, antideslizante. Por lo tanto, el automóvil se adapta tanto a interiores como al aire libre como playa de arena, humedales, pastizales, etc.

【Lista de paquete y servicio postventa】El paquete completo incluye: 1 coche RC, 1 control remoto, 2 módulos de batería recargable, 2 pilas AA de 1.5V, 1 cable de carga, 1 destornillador, 1 manual de usuario. ¡Será el regalo perfecto de Halloween, Navidad o cumpleaños para niños y niñas! Además, el coche de control remoto QUNREDA tiene un período de garantía de 12 meses. Si tienes alguna pregunta sobre el producto, no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros~

reviews_positivos.contenido: My nephew really loved his and it was still working but my niece wanted one so I got this for her. It still performs reallt well. She has a little bit of a harder time controlling it as this moves fast. She got used to it can now do flips. With these cars though, I would always suggest supervision when playing with these cars. The vehicles move pretty quick and can fly up when you flip them. In terms of mobility, it does move pretty well on most terrain but I do suggest indoor only for these and no dirt flooring as it can clog up the electronics. Also this is NOT water resistant. The vehicle can do some pretty nice turn. My niece loves that it is able to easily turn around and flip. She can do tricks on these pretty well but not as good as her brother. The wheels did not have any issues with leaving marks on hard surfaces. You could technically drive this on carpet but it may not track as well. It comes with two batteries so one be swapped so you can continue to play. I found the batteries only really last up to 20 minutes on constant play but you can charge one while the other is working. The controller is pretty nice. It does come with two AAA batteries. I did do a test on them to make sure they are full and they were. Regardless, I would recommend that you use rechargeable battery just to avoid needing to replace the batteries all the time. The controller is pretty easy to learn for my nephew and last for quite sometime considering it is just the controller. The connection is stable and for a good distance so you do not have to worry about it losing signal. I like that it does not really require too much line of sight. The controller has a simple left right forward and back. It is nothing too special nor does it have any kind of "jump". There was no required syncing from what I can tell nor does it interfere with other RC cars that my nephews had which is good. The controls are okay. It is not the best quality and the controller feel a bit cheap. The car is nice in design and the wheels are relatively durable. I did not see any issues with it wearing down. Even with the constant movement, it did not show any issues of coming odd the car. The battery is easy to remove and install. It secures well so you do not have to worry about the battery coming off when the car movement itself is very quick and fluid. It can do some pretty crazy spins. The distance varies based on the battery of the car and the controller. It can go a pretty good distance before losing connection. Overall this is a good and simple RC car to have if you want something with a bit more "tricks". It is simple to learn for most and can provide a good amount of entertainment (40 minutes at least) and could be something fun to race if you have two. The controller is not bad and easy to learn. The wheels do not seem to wear too easily which is good. It moves well and the frame is sturdy so you do not have to worry about it breaking from flips.
reviews_positivos.fecha: Calificado en Estados Unidos el 2 de julio de 2025

reviews_positivos.contenido: This was an amazing toy for my great nephew, age 5. He had a ton of fun. Super high quality! It is fast, climbs walls and flips. Super entertaining. Forward, backward, circles - Remote control with great handling and response. Doesn't mark up waalls or baseboards. iI was a great find and great value!
reviews_positivos.fecha: Calificado en Estados Unidos el 29 de diciembre de 2025

reviews_positivos.contenido: This little car is a blast! It will go over items and off big drops and it keeps going! Much better than the RC cars I grew up with! My ( year old loved it! Easy to control and super fun right away! Batteries come pre-charged, too!We are very happy with this purchase!
